title: Exploring HR Managers' Learning Facilitation Roles: Theory and Cases

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Concepts of Human Resource Management, Foundational Knowledge of Organizational Behavior Theory
context.additional_context: Participants explore modern changes in HR roles through online survey analysis and literature reviews, conducting discussions and case studies in a blended learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can classify and explain at least three learning facilitation functions of HR managers.
Learners can compare regional differences in organizational HR roles by analyzing survey results.
Learners can propose specific strategies through which HR managers contribute to employee competency development via literature analysis.
Learners can write HR case study reports incorporating peer feedback in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
